npc_task: Get me some Salt for 10 ducats, maybe go to the sea and make salt! I don’t know it’s your job
I need some hydrogen peroxide for cleaning my house, but make sure it's the 35% solution. I'll give you 150 ducats for it.
I'm making homemade soap and I'm in need of some potassium hydroxide. Can you get me a small container for 200 ducats?
I'm planning on making my own fireworks for the 4th of July. Can you get me some aluminum powder and 300 ducats should cover it.
I’m making cake. I need some baking soda, or as your nerdy face likes to call it Sodium bicarbonate. I’ll give you a slice of cake and 50 ducats. Actually nevermind, just 50 ducats.
